bug.author: jeffra
bug.description: There are two dead links at top here: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/microsoft/DeepSpeed/blob/master/docs/tutorials/CIFAR-10.md>https://github.com/microsoft/DeepSpeed/blob/master/docs/tutorials/CIFAR-10.md</denchmark-link>

comments.comment: I believe those two links should be combined and simply link to the getting started guide: ../../README.md#getting-started
